name: duxelles
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a mixture of finely sliced mushrooms, onions and herbs, often used to make sauces or to add flavour to dishes: Cook the duxelles over a low heat so that you don’t burn the mushrooms. The fish sits on a bed of mushroom duxelles.
More examplesFewer examplesPlace the fillet in the middle of the pastry, and spread the duxelles on top.A duxelles is a good way to use up any leftover mushrooms in your fridge.The flan is filled with duxelles and cream.Make the duxelles by chopping up a handful of mushrooms, an onion and a couple of garlic cloves and frying them in butter.
